titles.title: Celebrating the 100th anniversary of diplomatic relations between the United States and Poland.
Celebrating the 100th anniversary of diplomatic relations between the United States and Poland.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Europe, Eurasia, Energy and the Environment.

committee.subcommittee: Europe, Eurasia, Energy and the Environment
committee.name: House Foreign Affairs

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the 100th anniversary of relations between the United States and Poland. The resolution honors the contributions of Polish Americans and the Polish veterans who fought in World War II, Afghanistan, and Iraq.
